Subclasses of BaseProtocol in org.princehouse.mica.example
 class DemoCompositeProtocol
          This is a merged four-protocol, self-stabilizing stack that sits on top of an arbitrary overlay, "view" The main method demonstrates running an experiment with this protocol using the TestHarness class to create many simulated nodes on a random graph Layer 1: Leader election.
